channel.title: HPE Pdu on Cray System Management (CSM)
channel.description: Recent content in HPE Pdu on Cray System Management (CSM)

item.title: HPE Pdu Admin Procedures
item.description: HPE PDU Admin Procedures The following procedures are used to manage the HPE Power Distribution Unit (PDU): Connect to HPE PDU Web Interface HPE PDU Initial Set-up Update HPE PDU Firmware Change HPE PDU User Passwords Discover HPE PDU after upgrading CSM Because of the polling method used to process sensor data from the HPE PDU, telemetry data may take up to 6 minutes to refresh; this includes outlet status reported by HSM.
